version_description: Performance enhancement
Performance enhancement
Performance enhancement
Performance enhancement
General bug fixes and improvements.
General bug fixes and improvements.

- You can now receive all six-digit codes for verification by phone call if your codes are not sent by email or text message.

- Web payout links now work smoothly. Feel free to pay people with ALAT Payout.

- We fixed a bug in the recurrent bill payment feature. Keep saving bills you've paid for future payment. It'll save you time.

We're building the bank of your dreams.

- You can now receive all six-digit codes for verification by phone call if your codes are not sent by email or text message.

- Web payout links now work smoothly. Feel free to pay people with ALAT Payout.

- We fixed a bug in the recurrent bill payment feature. Keep saving bills you've paid for future payment. It'll save you time.

We're building the bank of your dreams.

- We've polished your dashboard, placed your most important financial information where you can easily see it and added shortcuts for frequent actions like airtime purchases and transfers.

- You will now get deals from our partners on your dashboard as available. We'll be saving you money on food, transportation and entertainment options.

- Choose your interests to refine the deals and information we send your way.

- The new Stash feature lets you save whatever you want, withdraw without restrictions and still earn 10% interest on your savings. Click the Goals button to use it.

- We squashed a few minor bugs and did some housekeeping to make your life easier.

We're helping you expand your options.

- We've polished your dashboard, placed your most important financial information where you can easily see it and added shortcuts for frequent actions like airtime purchases and transfers.

- You will now get deals from our partners on your dashboard as available. We'll be saving you money on food, transportation and entertainment options.

- Choose your interests to refine the deals and information we send your way.

- The new Stash feature lets you save whatever you want, withdraw without restrictions and still earn 10% interest on your savings. Click the Goals button to use it.

- We squashed a few minor bugs and did some housekeeping to make your life easier.

We're helping you expand your options.

- You can now buy movie and event tickets on the app. Tap 'Lifestyle' on the menu to give it a spin.

- In-app notifications are live. They're just another way for us to keep you up to date, no spam involved.

- Need a receipt for a specific entry in your account history? Easy stuff. You can now email receipts to yourself.

- You can now top up a Stash whenever you want to, no need to create a new one to save more.

Your bank is looking good and getting smarter.

- You can now buy movie and event tickets on the app. Tap 'Lifestyle' on the menu to give it a spin.

- In-app notifications are live. They're just another way for us to keep you up to date, no spam involved.

- Need a receipt for a specific entry in your account history? Easy stuff. You can now email receipts to yourself.

- You can now top up a Stash whenever you want to, no need to create a new one to save more.

Your bank is looking good and getting smarter.

- Request short-term loans whenever you need them. Tap *Loans* on the menu to begin.

- Create your own ALAT Virtual Dollar Card to pay online in dollars. Your first card won't cost you anything.

- Fund your ALAT account easily from any of your other Nigerian bank accounts.

- Track your debit card requests.

- Look out for pointers on the app menu spotlighting new features.

Just a few more ways we've made banking easier for you.

- Request short-term loans whenever you need them. Tap *Loans* on the menu to begin.

- Create your own ALAT Virtual Dollar Card to pay online in dollars. Your first card won't cost you anything.

- Fund your ALAT account easily from any of your other Nigerian bank accounts.

- Track your debit card requests.

- Look out for pointers on the app menu spotlighting new features.

Just a few more ways we've made banking easier for you.

- Group Target Savings lets you save toward a goal with an unlimited number of people and earn interest.

- Rotating Savings lets you save in a group of up to 12 people and receive the group's collective savings when it's your turn.

- Double-secure all your transactions with PIN and Touch authentication.

- First-time debit card requests now require a minimum balance of 2,000 naira. Your account will not be charged and delivery remains free.

- We rooted out some bugs and generally made your experience better.

We really want to be one of the best things in your life. :)

- Group Target Savings lets you save toward a goal with an unlimited number of people and earn interest.

- Rotating Savings lets you save in a group of up to 12 people and receive the group's collective savings when it's your turn.

- Double-secure all your transactions with PIN and Touch authentication.

- First-time debit card requests now require a minimum balance of 2,000 naira. Your account will not be charged and delivery remains free.

- We rooted out some bugs and generally made your experience better.

We really want to be one of the best things in your life. :)

You can now buy airtime and data, pay bills and send money from your Wema Savings or Current account on ALAT.
You can also view the history of all your Wema Current and Savings accounts.
Receive western union directly into any of your account. You can also transfer FX between accounts in Wema. We fixed some bugs and introduced some improvements in the app.

You can now buy airtime and data, pay bills and send money from your Wema Savings or Current account on ALAT.
You can also view the history of all your Wema Current and Savings accounts.
Receive western union directly into any of your account. You can also transfer FX between accounts in Wema. We fixed some bugs and introduced some improvements in the app.

- We've fixed several bugs and improved your experience on the app.
- You can now log in to the app and authorise transactions with Face ID on iOS.

Look out for future updates!

We added QuickLinks so you can check your account balance, buy airtime and send money to saved beneficiaries without signing in to the app!

Reactivate your inactive ALAT or Wema Bank account from the app, no bank visit required.

Sign up for ALAT with a foreign phone number and BVN.

We fixed several bugs to make your ALAT experience more enjoyable.

We fixed several bugs to make your ALAT experience more enjoyable.

We've revamped ALAT to make your life even easier!

Here's what's new:

- You can now buy insurance policies and pay premiums.

- We've taken out utility bills.

- Reactivate your dormant ALAT account in a few taps.

- Automatic notifications whenever there's a new app version.

- We added Card Control for all cards and a notification to validate your landmark or bus stop when you request a new card.

- Notifications during service delays.

- More fixes to make things run smoother.

We've revamped ALAT to make your life even easier!

- We've taken out utility bills.

- Reactivate your dormant ALAT account in a few taps.

- Automatic notifications whenever there's a new app version.

- We added Card Control for all cards and a notification to validate your landmark or bus stop when you request a new card.

- Notifications during service delays.

- More fixes to make things run smoother.

We've revamped ALAT to make your life even easier!

Here's what's new:

- We've updated our loan offers to include salary earners.

- You can now request receipt after transaction.

- We've also made signing up easier with video tour and text help.

- You can still buy insurance and pay for premium on the app.

- Automatic notifications whenever there's a new app version.

- We added Security Question to help you change or retrieve your PIN or password should you forget.

- More fixes to make things run smoother.

- Implemented liquidate loan feature.
- Implemented share receipt capability for NIP transfers directly from transaction details.

We've revamped ALAT to help you do much more!

Here's what's been added:

- A personalized your dashboard experience; switch between light and dark modes.
- Signing up is much simpler.
- You asked, so we brought back the Virtual Dollar Card.
- Simply request for your debit card on the app.
- Better loan service and a loan top-up option.
- You can also take a loan to buy new devices and payback in bits.
Note: You may be asked to validate your device when updating the app.

We're excited to have you join the ALAT Trybe.

To keep your experience refreshing, we've added new features:

- You can now pay for Lagos State Collections (Land Use Charge, Lagos Water Corporation, and other LASEPA bill payments).

- You can still make faster transactions with Quick links.

- You can reactivate your account with quick and simple steps.

- You can share the app or refer a friend using a referral code.

- More loan options to buy new devices and repay in bits.

- More fixes to make things run smoother

We've made a few changes on ALAT to keep it refreshing and help you do much more.

-you can now verify and retrieve your NIN on the app.

-you can make payment with QR code.

-faster transactions are still available via Quick Links.

-salary and device loans application are now faster

We've added a few extra features on ALAT to help you do much more.

- you can now get up to 500k PayDay loan

- pay for NIBSS E-Bills with ease. - you can also create your saving goals with foreign currency

- you can now verify and retrieve your NIN on the app

- you can make payment with a QR code

- faster transactions are still available via Quick Links.

We’ve tweaked a few things to make ALAT simpler, reliable and more convenient for your lifestyle.

- Signing up is now seamless and straightforward.
- The announcement card is back. Now you can be the first to see all our new deals and products.
- You can easily create Savings Goals with foreign currency.
- Get up to N500k Payday Loan.
- NIN retrieval and verification is still available.
